about_company: TPF (The Perfect Future) is a global smart-shore software service and technology innovation company. We specialize in providing agile and cost-effective consulting services and product development solutions to small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) on new Microsoft technologies on PC, internet, and mobile platforms. Established in 2003, we now have more than 800 person-years of experience amongst our team serving customers from our global offices. This has enabled us to perfect our methodologies, practices, and delivery models to exceed world standards and helped us make a practical contribution to increasing our clients' effectiveness and profitability.

about_company: Our mission at InMobi is to enable consumers and businesses to make smarter decisions. We build mobile-first customer engagement platforms that transform the economics of influencing global consumers. We help our customers engage consumers in a far more intimate way through mobile advertising. We offer a suite of solutions based on the core principles of simplicity and scale to help engage, retain, and grow your consumer base. Our focus on understanding consumer behavior and leveraging big data to predict their actions enables us to offer these unique solutions. Today, the world's largest brands, agencies, developers, and publishers are creating immediate business value by using our platforms to deliver compelling value propositions to their target consumers.

about_company: You are a part of Diagnostic X-Ray R&D team based out of Philips Healthcare Innovation Center (HIC), Pune. Philips HIC Pune is a product innovation center for multiple businesses with presence of R&D, Marketing, Customer Service, Procurement, Quality and Manufacturing functions. The center is focused on developing smart and reliable X-ray imaging based Diagnostics and Treatment products with enhanced patient safety to meet the unmet needs of a wide range of global hospital customer base
job_description: In this role, you have the opportunity to work with software team in Diagnostic X-Ray(DXR) R&D, and design & development of components/modules/sub-systems software based on the specifications. Eleva workspot is the heart of DXR systems which proudly owns the first of its kind CXA architecture that equips itself to be a common software platform over a wide range of radiography and fluoroscopy imaging systems. Eleva workspot is designed for creating, processing, and transferring digital X-ray exposures. It supports a fully automatic workflow, from entering patient data through image processing to film composition, with an intuitive user interface.
who_can_apply: Who are available in Pune and near by towns
skills: Python, Git, OOPs, Javascript, Java, C, C++
